resources.string: You can\'t start the application without a keyword.

An Open Source application that automatically shares your location while you drive based on SMS available on Github:
https://github.com/micku7zu/Locate-driver

Copyright © Sergiu Șandor 2016.
Application needs all the permissions to be granted because without them it can\'t function correctly.
Acknowledge that keyword was detected and send current data and GPS status.
GPS informations: lat, long, speed, accuracy.
Google maps link with your current location.
Informations about current address and remaining distance to destination.
